sentence.Network_en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentence.Network_en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentence.Network_cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentence.Network_en: The evening show was terrible, with hesitant unsure performances from all.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚上的演出很糟，所有人都缩手缩脚，显得很不自信。
